author: Ground News
title: Ground News - GALLERY: Bradford Mayor's New Year's Levee welcomes 2024
text: GALLERY: Bradford Mayor's New Year's Levee welcomes 2024 Mayor James Leduc and members of council held their 7th annual Mayor's Summary by Ground News [New Year](https://ground.news/interest/new-year)'s Levee at the BWG Leisure Centre. The event was a family-friendly, fun-filled afternoon of leisure activities and entertainment. The full program of events included a balloon twister, family sports in the gymnasium, leisure skating, and musical entertainment by Russ Clayton.
